data.title: School of Health and Rehabilitation Sciences
data.text:
SHRS on the Map

Directions to SHRS Locations (click on each heading for interactive directions):Â

Forbes Tower (click here to view map)

The Deanâs Office, most SHRS Department offices, classrooms and labs are housed in Forbes Tower located on Atwood and Sennott Streets on the University of Pittsburgh Oakland Campus. (Text Directions)

GPS:Â Use the address 219 Meyran Avenue, Pittsburgh, PA 15213 (it will take you to the parking garage on the Meyran Avenue side of the building but please use the Atwood Street entrance to access the elevators to SHRS).Â

Â Click the image below to see an interactive map including all SHRS locations.

Center for Emergency Medicine (click here to view map)

The Emergency Medicine program offices and classrooms are located in the Center for Emergency Medicine, located on the Oakland campus only a couple blocks from Forbes Tower.

Bakery Square (click here to view map)

Bakery Square houses the Human Engineering Research Laboratories (HERL), the Prosthetics and Orthotics program and labs, a Physical Therapy Research lab, plus labs and office space for Rehabilitation Technology graduate students.

Bridgeside Point (click here to view map)

Bridgeside Point is the new home of our Physical Therapy program classrooms/labs and PT administrative offices.

Neuromuscular Research Laboratory (NMRL) (click here to view map)

The NMRL is located on Pittsburghâs Southside just minutes from campus and houses the Sports Medicine lab. Â It also has a high-tech conference room and classroom for graduate students.

University of Pittsburgh Applied Research Center (U-PARC) (click here to view map)

This center is a University of Pittsburgh business and research campus. U-PARC is home to the SHRS Physician Assistant Studies graduate program.

View these additional maps:

University Points of Interest

City Points of Interest

Â

Forbes TowerÂ is located on Atwood Street (directly behind Starbucks on Forbes Avenue and across the Street from Rite Aid on Atwood Street). Enter the building on Atwood Street.Â (Do not use Meyran Avenue entrance.)Â

ParkingÂ is available in the Forbes Tower Garage.Â You must enter the garage on theÂ Meyran Street side of the building.Â From Atwood Street, turn left onto Sennott Street and then right onto Meyran, turn right almost immediately, into the garage. From Forbes Avenue turn right onto Meyran and left into the Forbes Tower Garage. Take the set of elevators marked for the School of Health and Rehabilitation Sciences, to the 4th floor (elevators are located on the left side as you travel down the ramps).Â

There are parking stations on the surrounding streets and additional parking facilities nearby.
